title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-6.1 - CO[2] Allowance Tracking System accounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 242-6.1 - CO[2] Allowance Tracking System accounts

State Regulations
(a) 'Nature and function of compliance
accounts'. Consistent with subdivision
242-6.2
(a) of this

Subpart, the department or its agent will establish one compliance account for
each CO
2
budget source. Deductions or transfers of
CO
2
allowances pursuant to sections
242-4.2
of this Part, 242-6.5, 242-6.7 of this Subpart, or Subpart 242-7 of this Part will be recorded in the
compliance accounts in accordance with this Subpart. (b) 'Nature and function of general
accounts'. Consistent with subdivision
242-6.2
(b) of this

Subpart, the department or its agent will establish, upon request, a general
account for any person. Transfers of CO
2
allowances
pursuant to Subpart 242-7 of this Part will be recorded in the general account
in accordance with this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
242-6.1

Amended

New

York State Register December 16, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 50, eff. 12/31/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
